sentences.sContent: Will these finds furnish more information on prehistoric man?
sentences.sCn: 这些发现是否能提供更多有关史前人类的资料？

sentences.sContent: Having bought the house, they couldn’t afford to furnish it.
sentences.sCn: 买下房子后，他们没有钱买家具了。

remMethod.val: fur(皮毛) ＋ nish → 用皮毛提供装备 → 供应， 提供

trans.tranCn: 装备，布置 （房间、建筑物）；供应，提供
trans.tranOther: to put furniture and other things into a house or room
